meaning_str.bing:
n. 班；（游戏或运动的）队；（同拉一辆车等的）一组牲畜
v. 使互相配合；使协作；使合作
网络. 团队；球队；十铨

班；（游戏或运动的）队；（同拉一辆车等的）一组牲畜
使互相配合；使协作；使合作

队；队伍；运动队；比赛队伍；团队；团体；组；小组；班；一组牲口；驾马的一组
协作；合作；结成一队；组队；与…搭配；配合；联合；使成为伙伴；使配对

1.en: Plus, if we make a trade for a Chucky Atkins type player, it will take a little while to mesh him in with the team.
1.cn: 还有，如果我们要交易像阿特金斯那样的球员的话，磨合阵容还需要一定的时间。

2.en: Another point is the same as my own experience can be used to set up a highly integrated team and to promote our work forward.
2.cn: 另一个相同点是我可以运用自己的经验来建立一支高度整合的团队，并推动我们的工作不断前进。

3.en: He said the founder of the Greasemonkey extension now works on the Chrome team.
3.cn: 他说Greasemonkey扩展的创始人现工作于Chrome团队。

1.en: And Paul's team brought the mathematics to life.
1.cn: 而保罗的团队将该数学运算变成了现实。

2.en: What if we disguised a new team to look like the old team? Oh, no, no. We are not cheating.
2.cn: 要是我们偷天换日，伪装得像旧团队？不行，我们不能作弊

3.en: Your men are shot to shit. What are you gonna do for a team?
3.cn: 你的人伤得不轻，你要怎么组建团队？

4.en: That's his MO, isn't it? I mean, what are we, a team?
4.cn: 这是他的管理方法，我们算什么？一个团队？

5.en: We can try. No. My team will take over the investigation now.
5.cn: 我们可以试试。不行，现在由我的团队接手调查。

6.en: So you're going for artificial intelligence and you don't want to tell the team?
6.cn: 所以你要研究人工智能，还不想告诉团队？

7.en: It's about being a team and sticking together, no matter what!
7.cn: 作为一个团队无论发生什么事情，我们应该一直团结在一起！

8.en: It was a team effort. Who is your source? I can't. You know that.
8.cn: 那是团队合作的成果，是谁告诉你的？我不能透露，你懂的。

9.en: As head of this team, and I think I speak for everyone, we have done…
9.cn: 作为团队领袖，我认为我可以代表所有人说我们已经...

10.en: Tell the creative team to get their giggles out. I'll be ready for them in 10.
10.cn: 让创意团队别嬉皮笑脸了，我十分钟后就能见他们。

11.en: Oh My Gosh. Duke find our lost ball. What a great team we're gonna be.
11.cn: 天呐，杜克找到我们丢的球了，我们一定会成为最佳团队。

12.en: Maybe they're not your friends. That was my whole point about team today.
12.cn: 也许他们不是你真正的朋友。这也就是我说的团队合作。

13.en: I assumed you might say that. Which is why I've taken the liberty of gathering your team.
13.cn: 我就知道你会这么说，所以我擅自集合了你的团队。

14.en: And I can work with the political team, coordinate with House leg directors, chiefs of staff.
14.cn: 我能配合政治团队协调，国会立法主任和幕僚长。

15.en: Amy, I was off by a factor of 10,000. But the Chinese team found the element.
15.cn: Amy 我算差了十万八千里，但中国团队发现了那个元素。

16.en: For the past five months, my team has sat at this very table, developing America Works.
16.cn: 过去五个月，我的团队就坐在这儿，起草美国就业法案。

17.en: We? But even failure hurts a little less when you do it as a team, right?
17.cn: 我们？但当你身处团队中时即使失败也不觉得那么沮丧了，不是吗？

18.en: Every time your team rolls out an update, there's a possibility of a critical failure.
18.cn: 每次你的团队运行一次更新，都有出现重大故障的可能性。

19.en: Your team? Are you kidding me? Look, this guy couldn't debug a balled-up napkin.
19.cn: 你的团队？你开玩笑吗？听着，这家伙连个揉成团的纸巾都打不开。
